description: Try our easy to follow Fast Tandoori Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fast Tandoori Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread yoghurt over base of a large serving platter. Pile salad on top. Drizzle over mint dressing. Scatter over extra mint, and serve with naan.
